Title: Relates to authorizing certain lessees to file complaints with respect to assessments
Summary: Authorizes a lessee who pays the real property taxes on a particular tax lot and who has been granted a contractual right to challenge the underlying real property assessment to file a complaint for administrative or judicial review of a tax assessment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to permitting certain lessees to file complaints with respect to assessments
